meanings.definition: To distribute information or materials widely
meanings.sent1: She was circularizing flyers around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The company is circularizing the new product details to all customers.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was circularizing acorns to all its friends.
meanings.sent4: The rumor was circularizing through the school like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was circularizing the assignment instructions for clarity.

meanings.definition: To make something circular in shape or form
meanings.sent1: He was circularizing the dough to make perfect cookies.
meanings.sent2: The artist was circularizing the clay to create a vase.
meanings.sent3: The child was circularizing the playdough into various shapes.
meanings.sent4: The gardener was circularizing the bushes for a more symmetrical look.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor was circularizing the marble block into a beautiful sculpture.
